channel.description: Recent content in security on PageDart

item.title: Why is my Site not Secure
item.description: Why does chrome warn that your site is not secure? Seeing the “not secure” sign next to the URL, like this: Then your site is not secure! Let's take a look into why and how you can fix it. What Changed? Should I use HTTPS? Should I Have an SSL Certificate? Should I Secure My Site? How to get a Free SSL Certificate Migration from HTTP to HTTPS Sitemap HTTPS Links HTTPS Server Redirection Secure Padlock Wrapping Up, Why is my Site not Secure?

item.title: How to Redirect HTTP to HTTPS in WordPress
item.description: Is your site secure? In this article, we are going to make sure it is! We will look at how to redirect HTTP to HTTPS in WordPress which will secure your site for your customers. As well as giving your users privacy HTTPS will also give you an SEO boost thanks to Google. To run your website over HTTPS you will need an SSL certificate, this can sound scary.
